definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 種族專長僅適用於人物的特定種族。

sentences.english: Until you have the expertise, don't bet on an inside straight.
sentences.chinese: 在你擁有這項專長前，不要在撲克中的順子上下賭注。

sentences.english: Lily: I can eat, it is my speciality.
You can gain additional Channel Divinity powers by taking divinity feats.
sentences.chinese: 你可以藉由選取神力專長來獲得額外的引導神力威能。

sentences.english: Miko:If I had not selected it, I would not have been chosen to hunt you down.
sentences.chinese: 如果我沒有選過這項專長，就不會被選中來抓捕你們。

sentences.english: Licking the leaders'foots is also his strong point.
sentences.chinese: 給領導溜鬚拍馬也是他的專長。

sentences.english: When you create a 1st-level character, you select one feat.
sentences.chinese: 當你創建一個1級角色的時候，你可以選擇一個專長。

sentences.english: Can a character who takes this feat stack the armor bonus from bracers of armor with Inertial Armor?
sentences.chinese: 人物可以將防禦護腕的盔甲加值和該專長累計麼？

sentences.english: I can draw anything, but faces are my specialty.
sentences.chinese: 我什麼都能畫，但臉部是我的專長。

sentences.english: Huang is glad to have somewhere he can put his skills to their fullest use .
sentences.chinese: 黃宗翰慶幸自己擁有一個能發揮專長的工作空間。

sentences.english: You must capitalize on your opportunities to give full play to your professional knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 你必須利用各種機會發揮你的專長。

sentences.english: Cultivate expertise in the application of assistive technology to instruction and other fields.
sentences.chinese: 培養研發身心障礙者學習與生活輔具專長人才。

sentences.english: Montano specializes in funds management work.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔諾專長於基金管理。

sentences.english: Specialities of the house are the crab soup, made from locally caught crabs.
sentences.chinese: 這家餐廳的專長是蟹湯，由當地的蟹做成。

sentences.english: You can take feats to learn the proper use of other kinds of armor.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以通過學習專長來學得如何正確使用其他護甲。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
